item.description:
Join us for a wonderful weekend of biking, kayaking, relaxing or touring around Southport Island located in Boothbay Harbor area Maine. Friday evening we'll greet you with a welcoming party including Beverages & Appetizers. Saturday you can join a group biking or kayaking trip right from our accommodations on Southport Island. Pack a lunch and have a picnic along the picturesque shores of Southport Island. Sunday will be an open day to bike or kayak around the Boothbay Harbor area or explore the many fine shops and restaurants in down-town Boothbay.

Accommodations: The Ocean Gate Inn & Resort
Located on Rt. 27 on Southport Island just 2 miles from downtown Boothbay Harbor.

Ocean Gate Inn & Resort is a full-featured oceanfront resort with a beautiful private beach and breathtaking views of Boothbay Harbor and Southport Island. Their private beach offers kayakers a wonderful place to launch for a paddle along the Southport Island or Boothbay coastline.

Ocean Gate Inn & Resort features a Heated Pool, Hot Tub, Mini Golf course, Tennis Court, Fitness Center, Volleyball court, Barbecue Areas and much more.

 


  • 2 nights stay at Ocean Gate Inn & Resort
  • Friday evening Social with Beverages & Appetizers
  • Daily buffet breakfasts at the Ocean Gate Inn
  • Saturday "optional" group biking or kayaking
  • Saturday evening "optional" Lobster/Clambake Price TBD
  • Sunday "optional" group kayaking or biking

 


Price is based on double occupancy "2 people per room". Please go to the link below for more information or to sign-up for this trip. Your RSVP will be added to or marked Paid for this trip upon receipt of your $145 payment.

Boothbay Trip Info. & Sign-up
item.name: Boothbay Harbor/Southport Island ME - Bike, Kayak or Relax Trip June 17-19
